item.title: CBS Cancels Stephen Colbert’s ‘Late Show,’ Citing Costs
item.description: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert will air its last episode in May of next year, marking the end of the franchise, Paramount Global’s CBS network said. Colbert, who has hosted the program for a decad
